tool_description: Creates structured volunteer opportunity listings with all essential details including roles, requirements, schedules, and organization information.

organization_name.description: Name of the organization posting the opportunity

description.description: Detailed description of the volunteer role and responsibilities

required_skills.description: List of required skills or qualifications

time_commitment.description: Expected time commitment (e.g., '5 hours per week', 'one-time event')

location_address.description: Physical address if on-site or hybrid

start_date.description: Start date for the volunteer opportunity

end_date.description: End date for the volunteer opportunity

error_messages: Invalid date format: Use ISO 8601 date-time format for all date fields.
Invalid email format: Provide a valid email address for contact_email.
Invalid location type: Use 'remote', 'on-site', or 'hybrid' for location_type.
Missing required address: On-site and hybrid opportunities require location_address.
Invalid date sequence: start_date must be before end_date and application_deadline must be before start_date.
Empty required fields: organization_name, opportunity_title, description, time_commitment, contact_email, start_date, and category cannot be empty.
usage: Provide all required fields to create a structured volunteer opportunity listing. Optional fields enhance the listing quality and help with better matching.

listing_id.description: Unique identifier for the created listing

listing_data.description: JSON string containing all listing information
